features.name: Magician

features.enabledFormula: "Base attack bonus +4, proficiency with khopesh or temple sword."

features.enabledFormula: "Inner Flame, Scorching Weapons, character level 13th, Ifrit."

features.name: Neither Elf Nor Human
features.enabledFormula: "Exile's Path, Seen and Unseen, character level 11th, half-elf."

features.name: Spider Summoner

features.enabledFormula: "Cautious Fighter, Desperate Swing, base attack bonus +6, halfling."

features.name: Terrorizing Display
